string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "The world want a show... I'ma be the stage."
"You can see a Scorpio sex drive in their eyes and often they bear a great sexual appearance."
"We can admire what we see, but we can only love what we truly know."
"Stay Loyal, Humble, and Hungry."
"The More Real you get, The More Unreal Things will."
"Live good, eat good."
"I work hard, not for the results or your opinions, but because it's the only thing I know how to do."
"I'ma make you feel like a virgin again."
"Lil Homie. Stay focused got shit to do."
"These bright lights turn me to a monster!"
"Inspire the aspiring."
"My heart big, but it beat quiet."
"Miss me if you blink twice."
"Uhh, sunshine like the brightest day. Momma do you remember the time, Michael J. When I seen the video I said hat's gon' be me. And I ain't have to dream, I made it reality"
"I hate liars; fuck love I'm tired of trying."
"Most of them girls I plan to never wife, but it's something about you that I like."
"Ass up, legs up to the sky. I know this ain't your first time, so baby don't be... (acting shy up in this room like I make your nervous)"
"Wanna give you that good love, fall in love me shorty you just might."
"If I get it I'ma hit it right, I know you tired it's the middle of the night."
"Let me taste between your legs, dang you got me so hard."
"Let me kiss you to start it off, damn your lips so soft; make a playa wanna bite 'em off."
"I sex harder; make you sweat sauna."
"I'm in this bitch til my eyes white."
"I don't ever feel like we vibing 'cause everytime we alone it's an awkward silence."
"Can't take the heat, don't feel the fire."
"Skip school, create my own lessons."
"Young Money nigga, money longer than a lifespan."
"More money to make, more pussy to smell."
"Momma taught me well, Kush and the L. Paper everywhere like books just fell."
"Leave the bitches, need the hoes. Life is a motherfuckin gamble, Peter Rose"
"The best Rapper C.E.O. Fine as wine flow; Pinot Grigio."
"150 on the dash can't even count; Keep fucking bitch, ain't shit to talk about."
"Raise hell, boy hell yeah I'm hot hello Boy yellow, but my b-tch back from the ghetto."
"Pedigree and swag is so cold, zero."
"You can buy a person's hands but you can't buy their heart. The heart is where enthusiasm and loyalty is."
"Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time."
"I'ma dog I'ma dog.. But that don't mean I'ma dog you out.... If i love when i love I'ma love everything around."
"What you don't see with your eyes, don't witness with your mouth."
"Is it better to be hated for who you are, than to be loved for someone you're not?"
"You Cant hate/Love others without Loving/hating yourself first."
"Y'all come first, it wouldn't be possible for me to get to the levels and goals I reach everyday and to achieve things without yall the fans."
"Don't wanna live this world alone, loyalty is all i know."
"Muthafuckas laughed at me, now everybody mad at me."
"I didnt have to dream i made it my reality."
"They can tell you how to do it but never did it."
"You can tell more about a person by what they say about others than you can by what others say about them."
"Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great."
"To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment."
"If I get it I'ma hit it right, I know you tired it's the middle of the night."
"150 on the dash can't even count; Keep fucking bitch, ain't shit to talk about."
"I didnt have to dream I made it my reality."
"Let me kiss you to start it off, damn your lips so soft; make a playa wanna bite 'em off."
"Cash stacking like tetris, his youthful effervescence."
"He's next in line for the blessing, get your mind off mine, Hustle something and stop relying on mine, molding a lesson while u letting time fly by."
"Diamond life, sugar baby we dynamite, Playboys and socialites, young n flyy flyy flyy."
"Diamond life, Don't regret it now! and space joyriding! ChaCha away!"
"Y'all ain't nothin' but cheap condoms."
"She don't know me by my name, she just know my AIM."
"All you gotta do is love me and be loyal."
"Im into different broads, f-cking in foreign cars. Wizard of OZ, tear coloured Benz, I aint got a heart, No love shoot the cupid with a dart, danger in the park. Motherf-cker dont walk past dark."
"Gambling cant rely on management. If its bout business Ima handle it. I see it all like an analyst."
"Mutherf-ckers wanna take instead of give advice. N-ggas left me now Im living right. Trying to cheat death with a trick dice."
"Looking at the murder rate never ask why. Colt 45, with a 4 5, the innocent die young cant judge life."
"Hate lies, never truth when its televised. Devils on the screen, fire in their eyes."
"I know my fault, I shouldve gave more. Now youre miles away and Im miles on tour."
"It take time to realise what you really wanna know. You was ready for it all but your feelings I ignored."
"I know feelings was hurt and you can blame me but Im sorry for the games that I played but now its too late."
"Now your heart broken, tears in ya face. Ask myself why, looking at the sky If I could turn back Id make it all right."
"Sittin on a plane Reminscing back when I made that mistake. I wish it never ended with a heartbreak."
"Trying to win but the finish lines far, race against the odds. Race dont matter when you dead or start praying to the gods."
"Last king living, give me space like a movement. Cream get the money, whip icy like cool whip."
"Man you n-ggas aint balling in the bull pen. Riding on the black mag Im a cool kid."
"Take a step as the world spin. Rumors come and go faster than a whirlwind."
"Got a sign on my dick, bad bitches only."
"Next day we in paradise promise to be loyal when honest, help out your family with a couple dollars."
"Let me show you why tunnel of love lets float inside girl grab my hand now hold your ride take a chance for life, roll the dice."
"I aint trying to hurt you now but I think Im in love for the first time."
"Used to be a player but Im retired, ugh, as I lay down right beside ya."
"Money is my pet peeve, give me hourly if there is none at all, than Im pissed off. I listen to Rick Ross and I know Ricky Ross."
"My b-tch aint got no tatts I hit her from the back. I spend south of France all that other sh-t is wack."
"All you n-ggas copycats doing sh-t I used to, oh you tatted too, n-gga f-ck you!"
"Cherry red Rover roof, crips to confuse you, you can say I blues you, better than I bruised you."
"I know you aint scared of tigers. I get around, they say my sex on fire."
"I do my best for you cause you my shorty so rest your head on my shoulders it feels good, dont it baby?"
"Ima a niceguy but I never went to college."
"Hard cash blood diamonds n-ggas violent babys crying."
"Now you goofy. Im an asshole and my car dufus. Mikey rock chucks like the cool kids."
"Tell em shut the f-ck up with that comotion. Im counting money get enough, get a promotion.Clm"
"Lord please devour all my enemies, that was Pac talking B-tch now back up off me."
"I aint never been cheap. I spend it all, never made Varsity but I f-cking ball."
"Tyga psycho, dont play tyco, 50 tyson Ill bite you."
"It killes me to know it, you Melanie Fiona. Ohhh, remove yourself from my scrotum."
"They say Im bout to blow up like super nova put your helmet on, the bulldozing dopest."
"Im Leonardo in Inception, reserve my section I do dreams put you in a bubble, benz or Lexus."
"I ain't a killer but don't push me."
"Snapbacks back!"
